overview: Eder is a University professor who in the midst of an age crisis sees the opportunity to seduce one of his students; she changes her look to a ridiculously youthful style, and abandons to your wife. His university lover ends it, so, heartbroken, he visits an old witch specialist in moorings, who ends up drugging him to sexually abuse him. Finding himself in extreme ridicule, he accepts his situation and the consequences of his decisions.
title: We need a break
